duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform routine production tasks under the close direction of the Supervisor and/or lead person, including but not limited to forming, assembling and packaging of products.
Use of various tools and equipment including, but not limited to hand tools, soldering equipment, assembly and test equipment, hand trucks.
Monitor work visually and dimensionally referring to blueprints, engineering specifications, and job instruction sheets.
Maintain quality and rate charts as required.
Follow all quality procedures and instructions.
Maintain housekeeping in the work area.
Other related duties as directed by management.

education_certification.credential: High School diploma or GED. Up to three months of experience in manufacturing or distribution is desired.
